full-terms.1: Zignaly reserves the right to cancel "Fee Vouchers" if the user is found to be involved in inappropriate, dishonest, or abusive activities.
full-terms.2: Zignaly reserves the right to amend the Terms and Conditions of the Rewards program at any time without prior notice.
full-terms.3: The "Fee Vouchers" are applicable to Zignaly's part of the "Success Fee".
full-terms.4: The "Fee Vouchers" are not transferable and shall only be used by the original user that attained them.
full-terms.5: Paid online advertisements with the Zignaly logo are strictly prohibited.
full-terms.6: All reward calculations by Zignaly are final.
full-terms.7: Participants found violating these terms will not be eligible for the rewards; any fraudulent or abusive behavior will result in the immediate termination of all outstanding rewards.
full-terms.title: Global Terms
